original_text: As one of them was cutting down a tree, the iron axhead fell into the water. “Oh no, my lord!” he cried out. “It was borrowed!”
korean_text: 한 사람이 나무를 벨 때에 쇠도끼가 물에 떨어진지라 이에 외쳐 이르되 아아, 내 주여 이는 빌려온 것이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: As one of them was cutting down a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 나무를 베고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the iron axhead fell into the water
